ChildCareTech.services

Class MainWindowService

  • java.lang.Object
    • ChildCareTech.services.MainWindowService

  • public class MainWindowService
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides a window management service for the main application's stages.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MainWindowService()
      Creates a MainWindowService instance based on a new stage created internally and sets the window for calling the logoutAttempt method and log out from server session.
      MainWindowService(javafx.stage.Stage stage)
      Creates a MainWindowService instance based on the stage passed as parameter.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Closes the stage.

      void hide() 
      void loadDayGenerationWindow()
      Loads the day generation window from the ResourcesPaths' relative fxml and css files' addresses.
      void loadLoginWindow()
      Loads the login window from the ResourcesPaths' relative fxml and css files' addresses.
      void loadMainWindow()
      Loads the main application's window from the ResourcesPaths' relative fxml and css files' addresses.
      void setOnCloseAction(javafx.event.EventHandler<javafx.stage.WindowEvent> eventEventHandler)
      Sets a method that will be called by the closing of the stage.

    • Constructor Detail

      • MainWindowService

        public MainWindowService()
        Creates a MainWindowService instance based on a new stage created internally and sets the window for calling the logoutAttempt method and log out from server session.

      • MainWindowService

        public MainWindowService(javafx.stage.Stage stage)
        Creates a MainWindowService instance based on the stage passed as parameter.

        Should be used for the application's most foreground windows.

        Parameters:
        stage - the stage that will be used to display the window. Should be the primaryStage generated by the start of the Application instance.
